author: Bethesda Softworks
description:
Reimagine the C.A.M.P. of your dreams with the newly organized workshop menu and relaxed building restrictions.

Fallout 76: C.A.M.P. Revamp is available now.

Follow us on the following sites and social media:

title: Fallout 76: C.A.M.P. Revamp Launch Trailer
